name: Chrome Storm Cobra Jacket
description: Our popular rain jacket with Chrome Storm™ breathable waterproof technology, bike-friendly fit, pass-through back pocket and pit zips.

name: Chrome Storm Pasha Jacket
description: The Storm Pasha features our fully-taped 100% waterproof breathable Chrome Storm™ technology. It has a bike-friendly fit for comfortable riding, pit zips and two way main zipper for active venting, a zippered back cargo pocket for cell phone and keys, and reflective details so you can be seen at night

name: NiteRider TL 5.0 Light
description: The TL 5.0 has five ultra bright LED’s with four different operating modes, including three different flash modes. The TL 5.0 will help keep you safe and seen from behind (180 degree visibility). The TL 5.0 operates on 2 AAA batteries (included) for up to 160 hours on flash.

name: NiteRider Mako 5.0 Combo Lights
description: The commuter combo pack of choice this year is the Mako 150 Combo.  The package pairs the powerful yet practical Mako 150 and and the CherryBomb Tail Light featuring a .5 Watt LED visible up to one mile.

name: NiteRider Mako USB Light
description: We understand lights are an integral part of your daily commute. Using a light can mean the difference between being seen or not by automobile drivers. Many of the “entry level” commuter lights are nothing more than “be seen” lights. Your overall safety and visibility should not be limited by your budget, that’s why we created the Mako Series. The Mako line now offers five models and up to 200 lumens, not only allowing the cyclist to be seen, but allowing the cyclist to see as well. Our favorite feature is the side “gills” emit a red light, which not only looks cool, but makes the Makos more visible.

name: NiteRider Cherrybomb Light
description: For much of night riding, the key to survival is not only seeing but also being seen, the CherryBomb addresses the latter. By incorporating a unique multi-directional collimator specifically designed for cycling, the CherryBomb maximizes visibility by dispersing light to the sides of the rider as well as to the rear, effectively eliminating blind spots to upcoming automobiles. To further rider safety and visibility, the CherryBomb employs a custom made, built in reflector which allows the rider to be night time visible even when the taillight is in the off position. Clip and bike mounts are included, for flexible mounting options

name: NiteRider Solas USB Light
description: The Solas 2 Watt Tail Light is brand new for 2012/13 and features a powerful 2 watt LED, 4 modes (2 flash/2 steady) and is USB rechargeable.  We’ve implemented what we call “Group Ride Mode” for cyclists who need to still want to stay visible and safer but not annoy others in the pack.

name: Incase Range Messenger Bag
description: The perfect fit for lightweight daily travel.

name: Chrome District Rolltop Bag
description: Our smallest, 100% welded-waterproof, rolltop backpack. Made to haul beer to the beach and protect your stuff in a downpour. Made in USA. Guaranteed for life.

name: Chrome Orlov Bag
description: Our smallest, 100% welded-waterproof, rolltop backpack. Made to haul beer to the beach and protect your stuff in a downpour. Made in USA. Guaranteed for life.

name: Chrome Niko Messenger Bag
description: Our water-resistant, padded camera messenger bag with iconic quick-release buckle and customizable interior.

name: Chrome Lieutenant 2 Messenger Bag
description: A waterproof Militia rolltop messenger bag with iconic quick release buckle. Made in Chico, CA. Guaranteed for life.

name: Chrome Citizen Messenger Bag
description: Our third edition of the Limited Edition Salvage Series messenger bag is made with vintage rain camo tents. Each one is completely unique.

name: Incase Range Backpack
description: Inspired by the freedom of cycling, the Range Collection is designed for everyday excursions on foot or on a bike. Signature Incase device protection, safety features and weather resistant construction combine to give you ideal carrying solutions whether you're headed across town or down the trail. The Range Backpack's wide mouth top provides easy access while the padded notebook compartment fits up to a 15" MacBook Pro. The padded shoulder straps, sternum strap and mesh back panel keep heavy loads comfortable and stable. High-vis reflective details ensure you get to your destination safely while the U-lock pocket helps to make quick work of securing your ride.

name: Chrome Krusk Shoes
description: Classic urban bike sneaker with CORDURA® Brand fabric uppers that are 25 times stronger than canvas and a nylon-reinforced sole. Performance and classic looks you can wear all day.

name: Chrome Truk Shoes
description: Classic urban bike sneaker with CORDURA® Brand fabric uppers that are 25 times stronger than canvas and a nylon-reinforced sole. Performance and classic looks you can wear all day

name: Linus Mixte 3 Speed- Rosewood Colour
description:
This sporty ride is a timeless classic with its signature diagonal line and streamline profile. Looks good in trousers.

Durable, partially lugged, Hi Tensile steel frame with Chromoly down tube
Shimano NEXUS 3 speed
Tektro dual pivot calliper brakes w/ quick release
3-piece forged aluminum crank
Double wall alloy rims with stainless steel spokes
Genuine leather grips
Mid-century alloy bell
LINUS alloy rear rack
AVAILABLE IN ONE FRAME SIZE:
Medium: 49cm

name: Brodie Revel 2013-SALE!!!
description:
Our most versatile road bike, with room for a 28c tire and fenders, mounts for racks, a wide range of gears and even an extra set of brake levers. Charity rides, fondos or the weekly road ride.

REG. $999

NOW ON SALE!!!!

name: LINUS BAGS : THE SAC
description:
Inspired by vintage boat bags this deep sac is perfect for town, beach or every day use. Made of waxed canvas and a coated base it is extremely durable. With a smiple hook design the sac attaches easily to your rack or with the strap you can throw it over your shoulder.

- Magnetic closure

- Includes removable shoulder strap

- D-ring adds lockable option

- INCLUDES PADLOCK TO SECURE BAG TO REAR RACK!!!

- Available in three color combinations:

        Army Green/Royal Blue

        Sand/Red 

        Navy/Yellow

DIMENSIONS: 16"(h) x 14"(w) x 5" (d)

name: Brodie Bolt 2013
description: You should never have to sacrifice quality for affordability. Meet the Bolt; Shimano hub, replaceable chain rings and double wall rims to ensure your bicycle will remain reliable and servicable.

name: Brodie Voltage 2013
description: Moving up from the Bolt, the Voltage includes mechanical disc brakes for better stopping power and longer lasting wheels. Now with a new shaped frame!

name: Linus Dutchi 8
description:
No need to fear the hills anymore, with 8 speeds and a full Chromoly frame this is your true go anywhere Dutchi.

4130 Chromoly frame and fork
Shimano NEXUS 8 speed
3-piece forged aluminum crank
Linus “Elysian” 700X35C tires
Genuine leather grips
Tektro dual pivot caliper brakes w/quick release
Linus alloy rear rack
Mid-century alloy bell

name: Linus Roadster 8 speed
description:
No need to fear the hills anymore, with 8 speeds and a full Chromoly frame this is your true go anywhere Roadster.

4130 Chromoly frame and fork
Shimano NEXUS 8 speed
3-piece forged aluminum crank
SLinus “Elysian” 700X35C tires
Genuine leather grips
Tektro dual pivot caliper brakes w/quick release
Linus alloy rear rack
Mid-century alloy bell

name: Brodie Argus 2013
description: The junior sibling to the Elan uses the same frame, with a sora/deore spec package. Disc brakes of course, for controlled stopping and room for 40c tires with fenders.

name: LINUS BAGS : THE MARKET BAG
description:
Rugged waxed canvas with oil skin leather, and solid brass hardware. this bag is tough but with looks to match. Perfect for the market or a sleep over, carry it in with a shoulder strap, or roll up the sides when not in use. Available in army green, navy or sand. D-ring's add the option of locking bag to rack.
 
- Includes removable and adjustable shoulder strap.
- INCLUDES PADLOCK TO SECURE BAG TO REAR RACK!!!

Dimensions of each compartment: 32cm (h) x 29cm (w) x 12 cm (d)

name: Linus Mixte 8 speed
description:
This sporty ride is a timeless classic with its signature diagonal line and streamline profile. Looks good in trousers.

Durable, partially lugged, Hi Tensile steel frame with Chromoly down tube
Shimano NEXUS 8 speed
Tektro dual pivot calliper brakes w/ quick release
3-piece forged aluminum crank
Double wall alloy rims with stainless steel spokes
Genuine leather grips
Mid-century alloy bell
LINUS alloy rear rack

name: Brodie Metier
description: Looking to cruise or commute but don't want to break the bank? The Metier comes stock with rack, fenders and kickstand; the hardest part of this decision will be what helmet you'll look best in!

name: Brodie Ronin 2013
description: The Revel and Ronin uses the same race bred frame as the Romax, with a more economical parts spec and still with disc brakes! It comes with all the mounts required for fenders and racks.

name: Brodie Elan 2013
description: Shimano XT hubs, shifting and disc brakes, because a fully loaded touring bike deserves better brakes than what's been offered in the past. Now with more rack mounting options!

name: Brodie Dynamo 2013
description: Brodie's popular Express model! The perfect combinations of features you need, at the price you want. For those who have decided to commit to commuting, the Dynamo is an excellent place to start: Mechanical disc brakes, shimano drivetrain.

name: Brodie Elan Vital 2013
description: Our crème de la crème touring bicycle featuring the Shimano STI 105 10 speed, Vittoria Randonneur Pro tires, Brooks b-17 Saddle and Mavic A719 rims on sealed bearing Shimano hubs.

name: Brodie Energy 2013
description:
Brodie's top of the line traditional drivetrain commuter features everything a dedicated cyclist will need including fenders and hydraulic disc brakes for all weather performance!

Boom!

name: Brodie Section 8 2013
description: The Section. 8 defies the category: It's a comfortable bike with an upright riding position yes, but not so much that you can't stand on the pedals to climb a hill and with 700c wheels that roll efficiently.

name: Louis Garneau Urbania SC-3 womens 2013 - SALE!
description:
reg. $499

"A versatile cycle path flyer." While retaining its performance heritage, it places the rider in a more upright position for even greater comfort and better peripheral vision. Agile yet confidence inspiring, handling is well suited for a vast number of uses, from fitness training to weekend leisure rides and commuting.

name: GARNEAU WOMEN'S AXIS SL3 BIKE
description: Developed for serious riders who strive to ride longer and faster. Taller head tube places the rider in a more upright position to reduce muscle fatigue, improve oxygen intake and attenuate tension on lower back and neck. Longer wheelbase adds stability and fluidity for greater control and comfort.

name: GARNEAU AXIS SL3 BIKE
description: Developed for serious riders who strive to ride longer and faster. Taller head tube places the rider in a more upright position to reduce muscle fatigue, improve oxygen intake and attenuate tension on lower back and neck. Longer wheelbase adds stability and fluidity for greater control and comfort.

name: Louis Garneau Urbania SC-3 2013 - SALE!
description:
reg. $499

"A versatile cycle path flyer." While retaining its performance heritage, it places the rider in a more upright position for even greater comfort and better peripheral vision. Agile yet confidence inspiring, handling is well suited for a vast number of uses, from fitness training to weekend leisure rides and commuting.

name: Louis Garneau Atom Kids Bike
description:
FEATURES:
Lightweight and durable S-6 alloy frameset, replaceable hanger
Accurate 21-speed Shimano index shifting
Powerfull alloy v-brakes with junior reach specific lever
Recommended for age 9 to 13

name: Garneau Urbania SX 1 - size M
description:
Regular Price: $829


Escape from the concrete jungle on Louis Garneau's Urbania SX2. Its Garneau Hydro-Nerv aluminum frame is light for easy and agile road riding, while the plush suspension fork combined with 700c wheels smooth out any road. This versatile all-around townie sports a 24-speed drivetrain for sailing over the climbs and powerful Shimano mechanical-disc brakes for speed control. And you'll love the upright riding position and cushy seat that provide a ride so nice you'll fall in love with biking all over again.

name: Louis Garneau Stella Kids Bike
description:
Make cycling the best activity 
Geometries adapted to put the rider into a position with a slightly inclined torso angle and a good leg extension can be achieved while still being able to touch ground while seated.

name: Louis Garneau F-24 Kids Bike
description:
Sturdy high tensile strength steel frameset
Zoom 386 50 mm suspension
Accurate 7-speed Shimano index shifting
Powerfull alloy v-brakes with junior reach specific lever
Recommended for age 9 to 13

name: Louis Garneau Trigger Kids Bike
description:
FEATURES:
Lightweight and durable S-6 alloy frameset, repleacable hanger
Zoom 386 30 mm suspension
Accurate 7-speed Shimano index shifting
Powerfull alloy v-brakes with junior reach specific lever
Recommended for age 6 to 9

name: Louis Garneau F-12 Kids Bike
description:
Comes in boys and girls colour schemes!

Smouth-out learning process with fun Our geometries designed for the youngest cyclists ensure they can learn in a safe and fun way. A lowered frame facilitates step in, while the position when seated allow feet to reach the ground as well as securely hold and control the handlebar.

name: Louis Garneau F-14 Kids Bike
description:
Comes in boys and girls colour schemes!

Smouth-out learning process with fun
Our geometries designed for the youngest cyclists ensure they can learn in a safe and fun way. A lowered frame facilitates step in, while the position when seated allow feet to reach the ground as well as securely hold and control the handlebar.

name: Linus Roadster Classic
description:
This stripped down, elegant ride is the bicycle in its purest form. A simple, clean profile inspired by French and Italian cinema from the 50’s and 60’s.

Durable Hi Tensile steel frame with Chromoly down tube
3-Piece forged aluminium crank
Double wall alloy rims with stainless steel spokes
Genuine leather grips
North Road polished aluminium handlebar
Shimano coaster brake
Mid-century alloy bell

name: Linus Dutchi 3
description:
This is your classic Dutch bike, a sweeping curved frame and refined upright posture make it the elegant choice for trips to the market or just riding down the boulevard.

Durable Hi Tensile steel frame with Chromoly down tube
Shimano NEXUS 3 speed
Tektro dual pivot calliper brakes w/ quick release
3-piece forged aluminum crank
Double wall alloy rims with stainless steel spokes
Genuine leather grips
Mid-century alloy bell
LINUS alloy rear rack

name: Blackburn Waterproof Phone Case
description:
• Lightweight, waterproof design
• Touch screen friendly
• Easy to use closure
• 420d TPU nylon, semi-transparent nylon

name: Garmin Edge Front Bike Mount
description:
Put you AND your data ahead of the pack with this new out-front bike mount.

This mount allows you to take full advantage of all of the robust data that Edge® provides without compromising the ride. The Edge is out in front of you for easier, heads-up positioning and increased safety.

name: Cima Coppi Winter Caps with Merino Ear Flaps
description:
We’ve been doing quite a number of these winter custom caps for various clients as winter descends upon us. Above are photos of some really great ones we co-designed with Steve at Mac-Talla Cycles which are available now, both in the Winter version and the Summer version. We’ll have some of our Winter Caps in OnTheRivet from regular collection super soon, we promise. They go fast, so get them quick… it’s tough to keep ‘em in stock!

The Wool caps are our signature 100% wool in the dual 50% woven wool and 50% knit wool for a great fit. Winter caps have a 100% wool ear flap.

name: NewBaum's Cotton Bartape
description:
This tape is made in the USA of highly durable milled cotton cloth.
We use eco-friendly dyes for a lower impact on the environment.
We think you'll love the tactile feel of cotton over any synthetic tape on the market, plus maybe you'll feel better, because you are using a product made with renewable natural resources.
- Adhesive back for easy wrapping
- Now in 16 colours including BROWN!

name: Lezyne Femto Drive Light
description: The Lezyne Femto Drive Front is a compact, bright, safety light. The lens is made of high-grade optical material and serves as an activation button that cycles through four flash and one solid mode. The CNC machined aluminum body makes the Femto Drive a durable and weather resistant light. The Composite Matrix back plate can be unscrewed to replace the two CR2032 disposable batteries. The multi-position silicon rubber strap attaches directly to the back plate to secure the light to a wide range of handlebar and seat tube diameters. Available as individual 15 lumen front (white), 7 lumen rear (red) , or as a front/rear pair.

name: NiteRider Mako 100
description: We understand lights are an integral part of your daily commute. Using a light can mean the difference between being seen or not by automobile drivers. Many of the “entry level” commuter lights are nothing more than “be seen” lights. Your overall safety and visibility should not be limited by your budget, that’s why we created the Mako Series. The Mako line now offers five models and up to 200 lumens, not only allowing the cyclist to be seen, but allowing the cyclist to see as well. Our favorite feature is the side “gills” emit a red light, which not only looks cool, but makes the Makos more visible. The Mako line is easy on the wallet and operates on 2 AA batteries (included).

name: Nite Rider CherryBomb Rear Light
description: For much of night riding, the key to survival is not only seeing but also being seen, the CherryBomb addresses the latter. By incorporating a unique multi-directional collimator specifically designed for cycling, the CherryBomb maximizes visibility by dispersing light to the sides of the rider as well as to the rear, effectively eliminating blind spots to upcoming automobiles. To further rider safety and visibility, the CherryBomb employs a custom made, built in reflector which allows the rider to be night time visible even when the taillight is in the off position. Clip and bike mounts are included, for flexible mounting options. New in 2012, we have your back with the choice of the .5 watt CherryBomb and the CherryBomb 1 watt.

name: Ortlieb Micro Saddle Bag
description:
This ultra lightweight seat bag is ideal for any cycling discipline. Throw a tube, a tool, and your wallet in and you are ready to go!
Perfect for spare tubes and tools
Roll closure with compression straps for tight fixing and smaller volume
Single-handed removal of bag from bike
Simple mounting to seat braces with two metrical screws
Waterproof PU-coated nylon fabric
3M Reflector adds visibility
Mounting set included

name: Ortlieb Backroller City Pannier
description:
• Large-size travel/commuter bag with roll-down closure
• A simpler version of the Backroller Classic, but same waterproof fabric
• Fits on either side of the rack, front or back
• Ortlieb's 'QL1' sturdy, lock-on system and beefy hooks keep bag tight
• Snug on all racks, even fat-tubed models
• Lower hook slides and attaches securely to rack
• Reflective patches catches vehicle headlights in the dark
• Easy-grab handles, shoulder strap available separately
• Tough, waterproof nylon (PS 490) sides, front and back of PD620
• 40 litre capacity/pair

name: Brooks Leather Bar Tape
description:
-Green or Brown leather colours

In the Brooks tradition, this bar tape is made of natural leather to make it the perfect complement to your Brooks saddle. The bar tape comes in a kit including:
 

- 2 strips of light, perforated leather bar tape,
- 2 natural cork and wood bar-end plugs,
- 2 adhesive cloth strips.

name: Surly Jethro Tule
description: Our Jethro Tule pocket tool combines an offset box wrench on one end with a bottle opener on the other.  The double-sided 15mm box wrench works with most nutted hubs on the market, and it fits nicely inside recessed dropouts, including those found many of our frames (the 1x1, Steamroller, Karate Monkey, and Pugsley).   The smooth, spoon-shaped handle provides ergonomic pleasure for your palm under the most rigorous wheel-removing operations, and it opens a cool refreshing bottle of whatchoogot after the ride.   The Jethro Tule is “Thick as a Brick”, crafted from stainless steel and then polished.  It works like it’s supposed to and feels good in your pocket.

name: Gore Bike Wear Cross Gore-Tex Gloves
description:
Competitive Pricing! Regular: $89.98

Dry hands in a rainstorm.
The GORE Bike Wear Cross II Gore-Tex Glove has a longer wrist cuff than most bike gloves, which means you don’t have to worry about wrist-gap and the subsequent rainwater that sneaks in between your glove and jacket sleeve.

Waterproof breathable Gore-Tex insert blocks wetness
Foam padding on palm absorbs shock on long rides
Reinforcement on back of hand helps protect knuckles
Absorbent material on thumb and back of hand for sweat wipeage

name: Tanaka Smooth Fenders - 700cx40c
description: These are designed in the style of Honjo where they don't come pre-drilled. You have to be handy or have handy buddies to install these. But heck, this is the best way to get a great fitting fender! Smoooth aluminum polished finish.

name: Fizik Arione CX Saddle
description:
Light, slim, elegant. The Arione CX features a new lightweight foam yielding a 20 grams weight reduction from the standard Arione.

Shell: Nylon Carbon Reinforced
Rail: K:ium
Cover: Black Glossy Microtex
Thigh Glides: White Microtex
Weight: 205 gr

name: Fizik Aliante Gamma VS Saddle
description:
Black.

Versus realizes that select consumers have been asking fi'zi:k for a model with a relief zone. fi'zi:k is now presenting the best channel option in conjuction with the Spine Concept saddle shapes.
Versus is not just a new product.
Versus is a complete range of saddles that combines the Spine Concept, fi'zi:k technology and new consumers needs.
Versus is a solid base design with an ergonomic channel spanning the lenght of the saddle.

Shell: Nylon Carbon Reinforced
Cover: White/Glossy Silver
Padding: Low Density with Relief Channel
Rail: K:ium
Weight: 259 gr
Dimensions: 265 x 142 mm

name: GIRO SURFACE HELMET
description:
SURFACE™
At first glance the Surface is an understated skate-style helmet with a clean exterior and a fashionable short brim. But beneath the stylish shell, the In-Form fit system provides comfort and stability.

name: Giro Reverb Helmet
description: A classic take on cycling style for today's urban environment. The Reverb's compact, classic lines are a perfect match to the clean new style that is driving urban cycling. The light-yet-tough In-mold shell wraps around to the inside of the helmet to resist dents and dings from life on the streets, and a self-adjusting fit system eliminates the need to dial-in the fit when wearing a cycling or winter caps. The finishing touch is a simple, removable cycling cap-style visor that adds a touch of style without compromising cooling ventilation in changing weather.

name: GIRO FLAK HELMET
description:
FLAK™
The Flak features a durable ABS shell, plush padding, and super sweet graphics to round out your look. Available in three sizes and multiple color and graphic combinations, its the right lid for the job.

name: GIRO SECTION
description:
SECTION™
The Section takes the skate-style look to a higher level. Its low-profile shape is distinct yet minimal, and because the shell and EPS liner are integrated though our in-mold construction process, we’re able to save lots of weight. We’ve also optimized the front of the helmet to work great with our sunglasses and goggles, something we call Super Fit™. And with a wide range of graphics, there’s a Section to suit any taste or preference.

name: Giro Atmos Helmet
description: Atmos continues to set the standard for high performance, matchless style, and comfortable fit. Its low profile silhouette, 26 Wind Tunnel vents, and benchmark in-mold Roll Cage make it a top choice for road, ‘cross, and XC riders alike.

name: Giro Savant Helmet
description: Authentic style and performance, with unmatched value. The Savant is an amazing fit for riders who enjoy great routes as much as a swift pace. The Slim shape combines impressive ventilation thanks to 25 Wind Tunnel vents, and the comfortable convenience of the adjustable Roc Loc 5 fit and stability system. And with the light weight and durability of In-mold construction, it won't weigh you down.

name: Giro Skyla Womens Helmet
description: The Skyla is equipped with key features for both road and off-road riding. Our Universal Fit sizing for women is tailored to fit, and our Acu Dial ™ fit system has been designed to accommodate ponytails. Its ventilation system provides ample cooling, even on the warmest days of summer. And our color-coordinated Snap-fit visor is a nice touch too.

name: Giro Indicator Helmet
description: The Indicator’s confident style and amazing ventilation are coupled with a modern design that complements every type of rider. It’s the perfect choice for riding downtown, up a technical climb, and everything in between.

name: Bern Brentwood Zip Mold Helmet
description: The Brentwood is Bern’s most popular bike helmet for men, featuring a removable visor (patent #US D572880 S), sunglass channels for fitting your shades and airflow channels to keep you cool. Urban messengers like Kevin "Squid" Bolger and Carlos Ramirez love the versatility of this lid. “The (Brentwood) is so light and low volume, and yo’, I can rock it all winter with the liner and be warm.” – Squid Bolger, messenger icon, Cyclehawk, NYC.

name: Bern Watts Helmet
description: The Watts is a bike helmet inspired by skate style.  Developed in 2007, the Watts is the successor of Bern’s signature model the Baker (patent #US D572, 865 S).  You asked for the Baker with vents and you got it.  Today the Watts is one of Bern’s most valued all-around lids.

name: Bern Berkeley Womens Zip Mold Helmet
description: Bern’s most popular women’s bike helmet provides superior protection for those of you who don’t want a Styrofoam planet on your head.  Whether commuting to work in traffic or riding for a cause, we can’t promise zero helmet head when you reach your destination, but we can promise to keep you safe and stylin’ on your journey.

name: Louis Garneau Edge Helmet
description: The plastic shell of the Edge helmet is made with U-shaped ribs that are folded six times to reinforce the helmet structure. Massive vents create unprecedented low speed ventilation, moisture evacuation, and cooling required of mountain bike helmets. Internal frame system enables the huge vents to be created without jeopardizing protection.

name: Louis Garneau Carve Helmet
description: The Carve helmet is lightweight, highly ventilated, and offers super protection for mountain bikers. The MSB technology (a monocoque structural base at the base of the helmet that reinforces the perimeter for enhanced protection) along with a fully bonded back spread the shock of impacts, provide support, and enable the helmet to be lightweight. Highly inspired by the Exo-Nerv technology seen in earlier Louis Garneau helmets, the U-Bar technology is made with U-shaped plastic ribs that are folded 6 times. These ribs act like a complex ekoskeleton that reinforces the helmet's structure. The Patented Spiderlock® Pro Retention, hailed as one of the best in the cycling industry, allows the user to adjust the helmet with only one hand to ensure safety while on the bike.

name: Louis Garneau Quartz Helmet
description:
Available in various sizes (S-XL) and colours 

Extremely light and comfortable. 

Ideal for men and women

Ridden in the Tour de France!


Review here: http://www.bikeradar.com/gear/category/protection/helmet-standard/product/review-louis-garneau-quartz-helmet-11-44764

name: Dura Ace Track Cog
description:
Available in 14 or 15 tooth.

Shimano Dura-Ace screw-on track cogs for fixed gear bikes. Standard 1.37" x 24 TPI threads.

name: Brooks Oxford Roll-Up Rain Cape
description:
Size Large

The Oxford Cape was re-created in London by a team of fashion designers who are also avid cyclists. The group mastered the art of cutting and stitching in Savile Row, the renowned London street of bespoke tailors. The garment is manufactured in England using the finest waterproof cotton, JB Raver Tweed and the same vegetable tanned leather used for the legendary Brooks Saddles. Reflective JB Raver Tweed is a Dashing Tweed fabric manufactured exclusively for John Boultbee using the finest worsted wool yarns subtly combined with modern technical reflective threads, woven together in a traditional mill in Scotland.

name: Brooks Brixton Tote & Shoulder Bag
description: The Brixton is a most versatile satchel, which can be easily expanded to become a tote. For use as a shoulder bag, it features a strap similar to that of the Barbican shoulder bag, the ends of which can be pulled together around the waist to increase stability whilst riding. The dimensions of the bag are compatible with our Hoxton Basket, in which it can be comfortably accommodated when shopping.

name: Brooks Brick Lane Roll-Up Panniers
description:
Available in black or moss colour.

Our Roll Up Panniers are inspired by the Cyclist’s Hold-alls, first featured in the 1890’s catalogue. As the originals, the new panniers can be rolled up or easily released when needed. This pair of commuter bags for traditional transport bicycles is entirely made of water resistant cotton with leather finishing. On the top of the bag attachment to the bicycle rack these panniers feature a crossed elastic to fasten additional objects to carry during urban transit. Last, but not least, the Roll Up Panniers are “self closing”, as they feature magnets on the flaps. Materials: water resistant fabric with leather finishing The Brick Lane roll up panniers attach to most racks with a width between 10 and 15 cm.

name: Brooks Leather Mud Flap
description:
MUD FLAP
Inspired by the design of the 1937 mudguard flap, our new mud flap is made of the same leather used for Brooks Saddles. It is provided with 2 screw bolts to fix it on the mudguard. Colours: Black, Honey, Brown.
 
MADE IN ENGLAND

name: Cardiff Kilgetty Roll Bag
description:
Capacity: 122 cu. inches / 2 liters Size: 5.5”W x 11”L
Material: 28 oz waterproof cotton canvas and oil tanned leather
Can be used a saddle bag or handle bar bag. Stuff a spare tube, multi-tool, cable lock and energy bars, and still have room for a lightweight windshell.
- Zipper and flap closure.
- Reflective patch
- LED hanger

name: Ortlieb Back-Roller Classic Panniers
description:
Top Quality waterproof panniers. 

Rear pannier (pair) with roll closure; starter version; QL1 system for rack diameters up to 16 mm; curved lower hook rail; PVC-coated polyester faric; large reflectors. Optional accessories: carrying system, outer pocket size S, mesh pocket, bottle cage; can be combined with Rack-Pack size S and M on the rear rack.

name: Giro Bravo Gloves
description:
The comfort-focused Bravo glove from Giro is nicely padded and features high-quality construction at a great value.

The breathable upper is constructed with a moisture wicking, 4-way stretch fabric for extra mobility
Synthetic leather palm enhances durability

name: Giro Merino All Season Sock
description: All-season performance and comfort.

name: Giro Coolmax Hi-Rise Sock
description: Cool, confident style and performance.

name: Giro Rodeo Kids Helmet
description: The Rodeo rounds up easy-to-use features and colorful characters that kids can grow with and parents prefer. And just to make sure it could go everywhere that kids go, we smoothed the shape for easy transport in child seats and strollers too.

name: Giro Venti Helmet
description: The all-new Venti is crafted for riders who desire the classic Giro fit in a larger-than-average size. Combined with our Acu Dial ™ fit system and Snap Fit visor, youve got a helmet that fits like a glove.

name: White Lightning The Trigger Chain Cleaner System
description:
The Fast and Easy Chain Cleaning System
The power of Clean Streak™ plus the scrubbing action of a chain cleaner! Snap onto the chain, backpedal and pull the trigger!
 
Clean Streak™ sprays onto the chain while brushes and scrubbers strip away grease and grunge from the chain.
 
The Trigger™ Chain Cleaner kit includes a 12oz Clean Streak CFC-free aerosol degreaser.
 
The Trigger is fast and EASY TO USE: just open the package, and you’re ready to go. Place The Trigger over the chain, and close the lid of the chain cleaner with your trigger (index) finger. Spray Clean Streak through the chain cleaner and onto the chain while backpedaling for 3 chain revolutions. Stop spraying, but continue to turn the crank for several more rotations. You’ll have a clean chain in under 20 seconds!

name: KryptoLok Series 2 w/ Flex Cable
description:
13mm hardened Performance steel shackle resists cutting and leverage attacks
High security Bent Foot™ design for serious protection and great value
Patented deadbolt locking mechanism for extensive holding power
High security, pick and drill resistant disc-style cylinder
Enhanced internal engineering resists twisting leverage attacks
Offset key location and overhead cam locking mechanism resists leverage attacks
Rotating dust cover protects and extends cylinder life
Includes versatile EZ Mount transportation bracket
2 keys - new "I" keys for easier usage

name: Kryptonite Evolution Mini 5 U Lock
description:
The choice of bike messengers worldwide


13mm MAX-Performance steel shackle resists bolt cutters and leverage attacks
Reinforced cuff over crossbar and cylinder for added security
Improved high security, disc-style cyclinder
High security Bent Foot(TM) design
Center keyway defends against leverage attacks
Anti-rattle bumpers reduce noise during transport
Rotating dustcover protects cylinder
Includes versatile EZ Mount transportation bracket
3 keys - one lighted with high intensity bulb & replaceable battery

name: ABUS U-Mini Lock
description: The Abus U-Mini 401 is the ultimate lightweight and small courier lock that is ideal for people who like to have a secure lock which is easy to transport, lock and store.

name: Kryptonite Kryptolok Series 2 Mini U Lock
description:
The next generation in standard bicycle security.

$1500 Certification

13mm hardened Performance steel shackle resists cutting and leverage attacks
High security Bent Foot™ design for serious protection and great value
Patented deadbolt locking mechanism for extensive holding power
High security, pick and drill resistant disc-style cylinder
Enhanced internal engineering resists twisting leverage attacks
Offset key location and overhead cam locking mechanism resists leverage attacks
Rotating dust cover protects and extends cylinder life
Includes versatile EZ Mount transportation bracket
2 keys - new "I" keys for easier usage

name: Abus Priomo Cable Lock
description:
The Abus Primo 590 is a 150mm long coil lock, offering flexible and portable security for your bike.

Key Features:

9.5mm thick cable gives good basic protection.
150cm length.
Self locking mechanism.
Reversible key for speedy and easy unlocking.
Weight:460g

name: Abus Sinero U Lock
description:
12mm special hardened steel shackle
The double bolted shackle, case and supporting elements are made out of Abus special hardened steel
Abus quality lock cylinder
Two keys are supplied with the lock
Corrosion resistance
Quality multi-use rattling free USH bracket
-Perfect for step through frames
Length: 9.05 inches
Weight: 1070 grams

name: Abus Bordo Key Lock
description: The Abus Bordo Key 6000 lock features an innovative 2ft 6in long link design. The benefit of this lock is how compact yet flexible it is. The Extra-Class lock cylinder uses a coded reversible key. The bag is easily mounted to the frame or carried.

name: Abus Multiloop 210 Lock
description:
Abus Multiloop 210, Cable Locks, 10mm/185cm, Black

Innovative 2 loop cable which has only previously been possible with a chain. The variable loops enable a flexible attachment of two different bikes over almost the whole cable length.

name: ABUS Granit Futura 64 Compact Lock
description:
Application:	 
Recommended for two-wheelers with a high risk of theft	 
Lock available with extra wide shackle or alternatively as an extra   slim version with extra weight advantages	 

Operation:	 
Attach two-wheeler to a fixed object (e.g. lamppost, road sign, fence)	 

Technology:	 
Special hardened shackle and ultra light material offer high protection against attacks	 

Drill-protected ABUS -Plus locking system

name: ABUS Facilo U Lock
description:
12mm hardened steel shackle 
Double locking mechanism and Abus cylinder 
Bracket included

One of our most popular locks

name: Lezyne Road Drive M Pump
description:
An excellent road pump- one of the easiest we've found to pump up tires to higher pressures.

The Lezyne Road Drive M doesn't resemble most mini-pumps we're used to, but in this case that's a very good thing.  


review here: http://www.bikeradar.com/gear/category/tools/cycling-tools/frame-fit-pumps/product/review-lezyne-road-drive-11-45363

name: Blackburn Voyager + Mars Click Lights Pack
description:
• Click front - 2 super-bright White LEDs
• Click rear - 2 super-bright Red LEDs
• Press lens to turn on
• Click Front 15 Lumen output
• Silicon straps mount to any bar or seatpost, no tools required
• 70 hr steady, 140hr flashing runtimes
• 2 CR2032 batteries included
• Improved seals prevents contamination from dirt and road grime

name: Blackburn Mountain Air Anyvalve
description:
AnyValve™ Head works with Presta, Schrader and Dunlop valves automatically
• Solid performance and exceptional value
• Aluminum barrel
• Rebuildable internals
• Ergonomic handle
• Cage mount included
• 162 grams
• Max pressure 90 psi

name: Cateye Strada Wireless Bike Computer
description:
Packed with functions but free from wires, the Strada Wireless epitomizes power and elegance.
The Strada Wireless boasts the largest screen and numbers in its class. Thanks to the new CatEye ClickTec interface, you can switch among seven modes by simply pressing the bottom of the computer face — easy to do, even on rough terrain.

Your selected mode displays at the bottom of the screen, while your current speed appears at the top in huge, easy-to-read numerals. An up/down arrow tells you how your current speed compares to your average speed.

The innovative FlexTight bracket mounts quickly, securely and tool-free to virtually any handlebar or stem. The new tool-free wheel sensor mounts effortlessly to most road and mountain forks.

name: Serfas USB Rechargable Light
description:
Available for front and rear! These are some inexpensive, practical lights - and no more buying batteries! 

	Intergrated USB Plug and Quick Release Bracket

	Produces 12 Lumens

	Run Time up to 6.5 hours

	Charge Indicator light

name: Lezyne Micro Caddy Medium Saddle Bag
description:
A medium saddle bag that is simple and fitted with a velcro saddle rail strap.

Weight: 115g
Height: 144mm
Width: 66mm
Length: 85mm
The vibration absorbing design keeps bag in place and out of mind with a unique design that eliminates the need for seat post strap. Can hold a multi-tool and 1x mtb or 2x road tubes.

name: Gore Bike Wear Path Neon Jacket
description: A jacket that provides all the necessary basics: reliable protection against rain and wind with a comfortable fit. The best choice for your daily trip. Better visibility thanks to neon-colour.

name: Gore Bike Wear Oxygen GT AS Jacket
description:
For more than 20 years, GORE BIKE WEAR™ has stood for high-tech function combined with premium quality. Developed and rigorously tested to keep out the elements while keeping in comfort, these ingredients are the mainstay of a collection that accepts no compromises in comfort, protection, design or safety.

In Gore's tight fit and Active Shell fabric this jacket is aerodynamic, super-lightweight as well as being waterproof, windproof and breathable. The perfect jacket for the serious, all-weather road cyclist.

Key Features:

Gore-Tex Active Shell fabric is highly breathable, waterproof and windproof.
Stretch inserts in a partial Gore-Tex material ensure a close, comfortable fit.
An ergonomic collar with a small underlay at the zip to keep you comfortable.
Gore tight fit Raglan cut with pre-shaped elbows, a long back and partially elastic hem for a tight, cycling specific fit.
A zip at the forearm gives additional ventilation and makes getting changed easier.
Reflective detailing.

name: Gore Bike Wear Helmet Cover
description:
This helmet cover should be an essential part of many riders arsenal. It uses the Gore-Tex Performance Shell to keep the wind and rain out and uses high visibility yellow material and reflective detailing to make sure you stay comfortable and seen out on the roads in the worst of weather.

Key Features:

Gore-Tex Performance Shell is windproof, waterproof and breathable to keep you dry and comfortable.
Neon yellow material and reflective detailing help increase your visibility.
Hem width is adjustable with one hand using the elastic drawcord.
Choose a size according to your helmet size, the cover is adjustable so it should fit most helmets.
Reflective detailing.

name: Axiom Flash Flood Rain Shell
description:
Economical rain-ready cycling shell jacket with vents

Repel rain and wind with woven polyester (PVC) shell fabric
Stay-cool venting mesh fabric in sides and sleeves
Stop drafts with elastic-seamed wrist and waist
Velcro-like front closure for easy on/off
Longer drop-tail keeps your butt dry
Lightweight and easy to stow for sudden weather changes
Yellow only, unisex sizing (sizes may be limited)
Manufacturer's one-year warranty

name: Bike Wear "Path" Mens Pant
description:
Features adjustable lower leg sections (velcro) to keep your pant leg out of your bikes chain.

GORE-TEX Paclite Shell
SHELL: 100% Polyester with a GORE-TEX Membrane
Machine wash warm. Permanent press cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry at low heat at permanent press settings. Dry or steam iron low. Wash with similar colors. Do not dryclean.

Guaranteed to keep you dry.

name: Gore Bike Wear Path Jacket
description:
Get yourself started: A jacket that provides the necessary basics: reliable protection against rain and wind with a comfortable fit. The best choice on your daily trip.

Napoleon pocket with zip
Zip pocket on back
Front zip with semi-lock slider
Zip-underflap
Adjustable cuff
Velcro fastening for separate hood
Adjustable collar with easy-to-operate cord stopper for one-handed use
Hem-width adjustable by easy-to-use covered cord stoppers and elastic draw-cord
Reflective piping on back and sleeves
Reflective logo on front
Reflective logo on collar

name: Panaracer Race type D tire
description:
Racing-Training
3D Casing goes bead-to-bead for optimal protection. 3D reinforced tread prevents puntures, pinch flats and sidewall cuts. Excellent distance and rough road tire. ZSG Dual Compound provides excellent grip in all weather condtions. And the addition of our PT Belt adds even more protection under the tread. Rock solid racing tire.

25C tire= 260grams

name: Louis Garneau Flow Kids Helmet
description: The Flow helmet is perfectly designed for your toddler and available in great designs.  The inner bug net allows ventilation but keeps insects out.

name: Blackburn Flea 2.0 USB Light
description:
USB rechargeable front and rear bicycle lights.

Choose from front or rear. Easily recharge with your computer!

Same price for front or rear.

1.5 hour recharge time
6 hour steady light time
12 hour flashing light time

name: Continental Grand Prix 4000S tire
description:
Fast, smart, special

The Grand Prix 4000s boasts global appeal as the best all round race bike tyre on the market. Not only is it fast and super grippy, thanks to its state of the art Black Chili rubber compound, but it is also tough with a healthy tread layer and of course our Vectran™ anti puncture breaker layer underneath.

This is an awesome racing/training tire - and we sell it at a amazing price too.

name: BROOKS SWIFT CHROME SADDLE
description:
The handsome Swift was the youngest gentleman's racing saddle in the Brooks range. It features delicately hand skived lower sides, where a thin stripe of the leather top surface is cut back, thus exposing the lighter coloured suede beneath which makes for an attractive visual accent and greater comfort when pedalling. The large copper rivets at the nose and tail are also hammered by hand, commensurate with our usual high level of attention to detail. As is the case with all of our hand manufactured saddles, the Swift proudly sports a metal nameplate at the rear, and in addition two embossed graphic details on the sides featuring the saddle name and incorporating an icon of a Swift in flight.
On introduction the Swift was offered only with lightweight titanium rails. However, due to popular demand, since 2008 we also offer the Swift Chrome, with traditional steel underpinnings, finished to our usual high standards with bright polished chromium plate.

name: BROOKS B-17 SPECIALE SADDLE
description: The B17 is our flagship model, ideal for long distance sports touring, trekking and ATB use. It has been on the market for over 100 years, being featured in as early as the 1898 catalogue . The model is available for gents and ladies: the B17 (gents) and B17 S (ladies). The Standard models feature black steel rails, the B17 Special features copper plated steel metalwork, and the B17 Titanium … Both the B17 Special and the Titanium also feature hand hammered copper rivets.

name: Brooks B17 Saddle
description: The B17 is our flagship model, ideal for long distance sportive touring, trekking and atb use. It has been on the market for over 100 years, being featured in as early as the 1898 catalogue . The model is available for gents and ladies (B17 S) in different versions: the B17 and B17 S Standard feature black steel rails, the B17 Special features chrome plated steel metalwork, and the B17 Titanium … Both the B17 Special and the Titanium also feature hand hammered copper rivets.

name: Selle Italia Diva Gel Flow
description:
Details
• Breathable full-grain leather cover
• Gel Flow technology
• Shell made from 10% Carbon composite
• Vanox tubular rails
• Differentiated-thickness padding
• Road / mountain

Women specific

name: Selle Italia XO Flow
description:
A more traditional lightweight, gel saddle. Great for everyone from hardcore riders to weekend warriors.
Competitive priced performance saddle
Color: Black
Rail: Steel
Clamp Style: Std Rails
Length: 272 mm
Width: 140 mm
Weight: 310.0 g
Gender: Men's

name: Blackburn Voyager Click Light
description:
2 Super-bright White LEDs
• Press lens to turn on
• 15 Lumen output
• Silicon straps mount to any handlebar, no tools required
• 70 hr steady, 140hr flashing runtimes
• 2 CR2032 Batteries included

name: BBB "Hardwear" Shoecovers
description:
BBB has a wide range of shoecovers, always the perfect shoecover for any kind of weather. BBB shoecovers are made of high-tech fabrics that keep your feet at temperature and dry during the cold winter. YKK® zippers guarantee a good performance in all weather conditions. All BBB shoecovers have an “Open Sole System” (O.S.S), which prevents damaging the sole. O.S.S is perfect for both MTB and road use.

Designed to protect you against cold and wet conditions.

Features:

•	Neoskin waterproof layer on top of 3 mm neoprene offers the best protection against the cold and rain.
•	Reflective industrial-strength YKK zipper.
•	Two Kevlar reinforcements between sole and zipper and on the nose.
•	Velcro rubber strap for a secure fit.

name: Gamoh King Carrier Front Rack - KCL-3F
description:
Silver Colour 

Designed for Road Bikes! 

40lbs load limit. 

- Steel tubing powdercoated silver
- 16x11.5 inches

name: Gore Bike Wear "Power" Overshoes - SALE $54.90
description: Perfect protection for feet: keep your feet warm and dry inside these overshoes, which are designed to defy all weather conditions. For cyclists all year round.

name: Lazer O2 Helmet
description:
A great value road helmet with great looks and advanced technologies from higher up the Lazer range.

Fit System: Innovative Fit System (Rollsys®)
Construction: In-Mold (4 pieces)
Ventilation: 24 vents
Certification: CE - CPSC - AS
Sizes: Unisize (53-61cm) - XL/XXL

name: Blackburn Airstik 2 Stage Bike Pump
description:
Awesome road pump.

Comes with mounting bracket.

• High Volume Mode and High Pressure Mode for faster inflation and with less effort
• Mode Switch on handle
• Aluminum barrel and shaft
• Rebuildable internals
• Presta-specific head
• Cage mount included
• 84 grams
• Max pressure 160psi

name: Axiom PropelAir 160 Gauge
description: Easier to achieve 160psi (for riders who are unable to achieve adequate pressure out of standard floor pumps) - Adapt Air plus valve w/ alloy cap - 160psi gauge - Dual Density handle - Extended hose

name: BBB AquaShield Glove
description:
BBB winter gloves are made of high-tech fabric that keeps the heat in and cold out. Maximum air circulation so your hands do not feel cold and clammy. Strong and durable to withstand the rough demands of cycling, yet surprisingly gentle and comfortable to your hands. You’ll be hard-pressed for an excuse not to go out cycling even in the deepest winter. So go out there and ride!

Top of the range technical glove for wet and dry winter weather. For competition use.

•	Amara®: The thumb and forefinger area is reinforced by Amara. This strong and durable fabric resists wear and tear in the high stress areas.
•	Gel-Insert: The gel-inserts absorb impacts and reduce pain and numbness in the hand.
•	Rubbertec® Reinforcements: Allows direct contact and the best grip in wet and dry conditions.
•	Silicon Prints: The silicon prints allow perfect grip on the handlebar grips as well as
brake levers.

Features:
•	Amara reinforced thumb and forefinger.
•	Vitech palm material with Rubbertec reinforcement, gel-insert and anti-slip silicone print on the fingers.
•	Eurotex layer made of tough PolyUrethane stops cold air and water. Microdots allow moisture to escape, helping your hands stay warm and dry.
•	Top is made of Thermoflex material with Spandex insert.
•	40mm Thermostat cuff with inner layer pre-stitched gloves liner for a comfortable fit and maximum isolation.

name: Axiom Hot Hand Glove
description: A lightweight winter glove that can be used on its own, or inside of the Hydroshell for added warmth.

name: Bobike Maxi SC
description:
For children from 9 months to 6 years
Suitable for children weighing from 9 to 22 kilos
With a three-point safety belt and safety buckle
Fitted with adjustable foot support trays
Three-point assembly to the bicycle frame

Also available in white.

name: Gore Bike Wear Countdown Glove
description: Versatile rain protection for the hands. These light GORE-TEX® gloves are an essential accessory for mountain courses and longer cycle tours in the rain.

name: Gore Bike Wear Mistral Glove
description: Versatile: these gloves are not designed for one single use, but can be used on many moderate cycling tours and in everyday situations.

name: BBB Speed Ribbon Handlebar Tape
description:
Microfiber handlebar tape.

•	Perforated surface for ventilation and moisture absorption
•	Washable leather look
•	Waterproof Glue
•	Edging tape and bar end caps included

name: Cycleops Fluid 2 Trainer
description:
If it's important to you to make every workout count, the Fluid2 trainer is the most valuable weapon you can add to your indoor training arsenal.

-Larger flywheel for improved road-like feel.
-Infinite resistance curve.
-Self-cooling mechanisms keep the unit performing better, longer.
-Cam-Lever tightens resistance unit with one movement.

name: Kurt Kinetic Road Machine
description: It’s the perfect workout partner for sprints to intervals to all-day cruising. Quiet. Smooth. And like every Kinetic Trainer, 100% leak-proof. The power calibration gives you true outdoor simulation. The automatic resistance adjusts as you change speeds. Realism as only Kinetic can deliver it.

name: Kurt Kinetic Cyclone Wind Trainer
description: Kurt Kinetic's Cyclone wind trainer uses a dual fan design to offer truer, road-like resistance and lasting durability. Two 2.2-pound fans deliver quiet, speed-sensitive resistance at any wattage or speed and a 5-second coast-down for a real-to-the-road experience. Plus, the Cyclone boasts a wide, precision-machined roller to reduce tire wear, and a sturdy folding frame with a secure and easy-to-use bike mount.

name: Cycleops Riser Block
description: The CycleOps Riser Block's unique three level design, let's you pick a height for your front tire that will make your trainer riding time more comfortable and productive. You'll train harder and longer, because you'll be riding a more natural position. Virtually indestrucible, the injection-molded Riser blocks stabilizes your bike for a worry free in any rear mounted trainer.

name: Alan Roland 5 Frameset
description:
The Alan Roland 5 is handbuilt in Italy and features a very impressive 1150g frame weight. 

Built with Scandium tubing and a carbon rear end, this World Class cyclocross bike is also sold with a sub-400g Edge Composites Cyclocross Fork. 

Alan has proved itself on the world stage with over 20 World Cyclocross Championship wins. 

Come into the shop today to get a better look at this truly exceptional racing machine.

For more info, visit:  http://www.stellinasport.com/bikes/cyclocross/roland-5/#/images/product_photos/roland5__0001_IMG_2440JPG.jpg

name: Alan Mercurial Frameset
description:
The Alan Mercurial features world-class frame geometry at an attractive price point. This is a mid-level cyclocross bike that shares many features found on the higher end Alan Bikes, including World Championship winning geometry. 

Price includes Alan Aluminum Cyclocross Fork. 

Other colours available! 

Come into the shop today to view this great bike today! 

For more information, visit: http://www.stellinasport.com/bikes/cyclocross/cross_mercurial_pro/#/images/product_photos/Foto_011_1.jpg 

Note: If building up with grouppo from shop, then price negotiable.

name: Cycleops Wind Trainer
description:
The CycleOps Wind Trainer is ideal if you're looking for the simplest, most straightforward means to maintain your riding fitness in wintertime. The Wind is built using the most long-lived trainer technology out there: A weighted metal fan blade generates wind resistance as you pedal. The resistance is variable and it builds at a progressive rate with increased wheel speed. Just like riding on the road, gear down and you can spin on your rest days. If you want to suffer, grab the big ring and mash the pedals. At 30mph wheel speeds, the CycleOps Wind Trainer will generate in excess of 600+ watts of resistance.

The Wind Trainer is foldable and stows away easily. The rubber coated base pads are adjustable to level out crooked basement floors. The quick release locking mechanism can be adjusted to accommodate both mountain and road bikes. One practical note: Compared to Cycleops' other trainer models, the Wind Trainer generates more noise when you're riding it. If keeping things quiet when you train indoors is a priority, you should consider Cycleops' other models. It comes with a Race Day Training DVD to help get you started.

name: Voyager Deluxe Kids Seat
description:
-3 position reclining seat, with a steel quick-release locking mechanism
-Fully Adjustable footrests
-Adjustable headrest, slightly offset to make way for child's helmet
-High headrest with padded handles
-Tubular alloy rack included
-Removable and washable seat cover, 2 compartments under the seat
-For kids up to 22kg

name: Alan Peter-Klaus 2 Frameset
description:
With over 20 World Championships to its name, the Peter-Klaus 2 is a proven cross racing machine. Built with Easton Ultralight aluminum tubing, the frame weighs in at 1300g, while the sub-400g carbon Edge Composites Cross Fork adds an impressive weight savings to the frameset. 

Alan bikes are handmade in Italy and feature arguably the best cross racing geometry the bicycle industry has to offer. 

Come in to the shop today to get a better preview of our Alan Cross bikes. 

If building up with a grouppo from the shop, then price is negotiable. 


For more information: http://www.stellinasport.com/bikes/cyclocross/klaus-peter_2/

name: Serfas TL-ST Seat Stay Taillight
description:
Super Bright!

	One 1/2 Watt Super Bright Red LED w/ Six 4mm Red LEDs

	3 Beam Modes-Steady, Flashing, and Strobe

	Water Resistant, Silocone Body Simply Mounts to Any Tube on      Your Bike

	Burn Time: Up to 100 Hours

	Battery: 2 Lithium CR 2032 Included

name: SKS Base Bag S
description: The basic saddle bag is fastened onto the seat post and seat rail with Velcro. All bags have a reflective stripe as safety feature and an extra compartment for a mini tool.

name: Beljum Budder Skin Lubricant
description:
In the world of endurance sports, friction is a four letter word. Friction can cause enormous discomfort & injury and can seriously affect your performance.

Beljum Budder provides maximum protection from chafing and other friction related problems. Used by some of the biggest names in endurance cycling, Our surprisingly light, yet highly effective formula contains a unique blend of soothing botanicals, essential vitamins and other ingredients which have been specifically designed to address the lubrication needs of the long distance athlete while eliminating some of the harsh chemicals found in other balms.

Beljum Budder delivers superior performance and comfort when needed yet easily washes clean with soap and water. Go ahead, "slip" into something a little more comfortable with Beljum Budder. The Natural Choice for Chafing Protection

We don't do or believe in any kind of animal testing.

Paraben-Free
Petroleum-Free
Fragrance-Free
Non-Staining
Non-Greasy, All Natural, Antibacterial
Vitamins A,D & E

name: Basil Memories Bottle Basket
description:
BASIL MEMORIES-BOTTLE BASKET. Our best seller featuring a fun milk-bottle design. Like the Cardiff, this basket simply hooks onto the rear carrier. 

Check out the various colours.

24x33x33

name: Basil Memories Front Carrier
description:
BASIL MEMORIES-FRONT CARRIER L. 

Robust steel front carrier that attaches to fork and non-oversize handlebars (cannot be used on suspension forks either!). Includes light mount. 

Max 15kg.

31x28x27

name: LINUS BAGS : THE OFFICE BAG
description:
With it’s structured form and straight lines this bag compliments the clean LINUS look and is the perfect accessory for the professional on two wheels. Fits your 13” laptop. Attaches securely to the rear rack with leather straps and brass buckles and can be carried in with a removable shoulder strap. The office bag is made of durable waxed canvas and solid brass hardware.  Available in navy or army green with cream lining. D-ring adds the option of locking bag to rack.

- Includes removable and adjustable shoulder strap.
 
- INCLUDES PADLOCK TO SECURE BAG TO REAR RACK!!!

Dimensions: 33cm (h) x 27cm (w) x 11cm (d)

name: LINUS BAGS : THE SATCHEL
description:
With a minimal but functional design this sturdy waxed canvas bag with magnetic closure has a padded sleeve to carry your lap top and space for more. Hooks easily to your rack or with waste and shoulder strap you can wear it on your back as you ride. 

- Magnetic closure

- Includes removable shoulder/waist strap

- D-rings adds lockable options

- INCLUDES PADLOCK TO SECURE BAG TO REAR RACK!!!

DIMENSIONS: 10"(h )x 15"(w) x 2 1/2"(d)

name: Fizik Microtex Bar tape
description:
Made of Microtex microfibre: durable, strong, and breathable.

Smooth and comfortable to touch, even when wet. 

Thin tape with almost zero added weight.
